name: iris
description: IRIS (Intelligent Response Interface System) is a Discord bot created by and for the Chaos Crew Community.

scripts.compile: npm run cleanup && npm run build
scripts.versionControl: node -e "let e=require('fs'),n=require('path'),r=require('dotenv');r.config();const getAllFiles=function(r,i){const o=e.readdirSync(r);return i=i||[],o.forEach((function(o){e.statSync(r+'/'+o).isDirectory()?i=getAllFiles(r+'/'+o,i):i.push(n.join(r.toString(),'/',o))})),i};let o=getAllFiles('./src'),t=o.join(''),c='';for(let n of o)c+=e.readFileSync(n,'utf-8');const s=JSON.parse(e.readFileSync('./package.json',{encoding:'utf-8'})),a=`${s.version.replace(/-.*/,'')}-${'YES'==process.env.DEVELOPMENT?'DEV':'STABLE'}-${require('md5')(t+'|'+c).substring(0,8)}`;s.version=a,e.writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(s,null,2),{encoding:'utf-8'});"
scripts.CnR: npm run cleanup && npm install && npm run versionControl && npm run build && npm run start

author: Inimi
